Translations.Text: Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Shizhemen [tianshi] a! Nimen de shiming shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women fengming qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong,
women jiang jiangxia shaoguo de niantu ban de shi kuai chengzhi tamen,
[naxie shi kuai] zai ni de zhu nali shi wei chengfa guofen zhe [chaoyue fadu zhe] er dashang laoyin de.”
Wo jiuchule chengzhong de xinshi,
dan wo zai chengzhong zhi faxian yijia musilin [lu te shengren he ta de liang ge nu'er].
Wo zai nali gei weiju tongku de xingfa zhe liu xiale yi zhong jixiang [sihai].
Zai mu sa de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, wo pai ta daizhe yi zhong mingzheng qu jian falao.
Dan ta [falao] yizhang ta de quanshi [jundui] beiqi ta [mu sa]. Ta [falao] shuo:“[Ni shi] yige moshu shi huo fengzi.”
Suoyi, wo chengzhile ta he ta de jundui, wo ba tamen reng jin dahai zhong [yan si], yinwei ta [falao] shi ying shou qianze de.
Zai a de ren de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, wo pai huimie xing de kuangfeng chengfa tamen.
Fanshi kuangfeng jingguo zhi chu, quanbu hui wei suipian.
Zai sa mu de ren de gushi zhong [yeyou yi zhong jixiang]. Dangshi, you hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhanshi xiangshou ba!”
Dan tamen weikang tamen de zhu de mingling, suoyi, pili sheng zai tamen qinyan mudu xia xijile tamen.
Yinci, tamen zhan bu qilai, ye buneng zijiu.
Zai tamen zhiqian,[wo ceng huimiele] nu ha de zuren. Tamen shi beini de minzhong.
Wo yi wo de quanli jianzaole tian, wo que shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe.
Wo zhankaile da di. Wo shi duome zhuoyue de zhankai zhe a!
Wo ba mei zhong wu dou zaocheng liangxing de, yibian nimen sikao [an la de enhui].
[Ni shuo]:“Nimen gankuai tao gui an la ba [cong jiang zao an la de chengfa tao xiang huoqu an la de kuanshu he ci min——yisilan jiao]! Wo que shi ta paiqian gei nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe [zhu].
Nimen buyao ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling, wo que shi ta paiqian gei nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Tamen de qian ren yeshi zheyang, mei dang you shizhe lailin tamen, tamen bi [dui ta] shuo:“[Ni shi] yige moshu shi huo fengzi.”
Nandao tamen [qian ren] yi ci zhufu zhexie ren [gu lai shen de yi jiaotu] ma? Qishi, tamen shi panni de minzhong.
Ni [mu sheng] dang bi kai tamen [gu lai shen de yi jiaotu], ni shi bu shou zebei de [yinwei ni yi xiang tamen chuandale an la de qishi].
Ni dang [yi “gulanjing”] jiaohui [renlei], yinwei jiaohui dui xinshimen que shi youyi de.
Wo [an la] chuangzao jingling he renlei, mudi shi rang tamen chongbai wo.
Wo buyao tamen de renhe gongyang, wo buyao tamen gong wo yinshi.
An la que shi [wanwu] zui hao de gongji zhe, que shi zui you quanli de, que shi zui qiang da de [zhu].
Bu yi zhe bi jiang zaoshou tamen xiri de huobanmen suo zaoshou de xingfa, suoyi, jiao tamen buyao cuicu wo zaori shixian xingfa.
Bu xinyang zhe bei jinggao de rizi lailin shi, tamen [bu xinyang zhe] jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Yi shan fashi!
Yi jilu zai zhankai de yangpi zhi shang de jingdian [“gulanjing”] fashi!
Yi renlei chaojin de tian fang fashi!
Yi gaosong de tianqiong fashi!
Yi wangyang dahai fashi [huo yi fuhuo ri bei dian shao de dahai fashi]!
Ni de zhu de xingfa kending shi yao lailin de,
renhe ren dou buneng dikang ta.
Dangtian ti [kongbu de] zhendong zhi ri,
qun shan jiang bei yi hui.
Zai na ri, fouren zhenli zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Yinwei tamen zai wang tan zhong qule.
Dang tamen bei qiangxing tui ru huo yu zhi ri,
[you hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe jiushi nimen [shengqian] suo fouren de huo yu.
Zhe shi moshu ne? Haishi nimen kan bujian?
Nimen changshi huoxing ba! Wulun nimen neng renshou, haishi buneng renshou, dui nimen dou shi yiyang de. Nimen zhi shou nimen suo fanzui e de huan bao.”
Jingwei zhe bi zai leyuan he enze zhong,
[tamen] xinxi yu tamen de zhu ciyu tamen de [enhui]. Tamen de zhu yi zhengjiu tamen tuoli huo yu de xingfa.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen yin nimen suo zuo de shangong yukuai di chihe ba!”
[Tamen] kao zai cheng pai de bao yi shang, wo jiang baijing mei mu xianshu di meinu zuo tamen de qizi.

Fan ziji xinyang, qi zisun ye tong tamen yiqi xinyang zhe, wo jiang shi tamen de zisun [zai leyuan li] yu tamen tuanju [zhu 1], wo bu hui jianshao tamen de renhe shangong [zhu 2]. Mei ren dou yingdui ziji suo zuo de shi fuze.
Wo jiang ba tamen xiang yao de shuiguo he roushi ci gei tamen.
Tamen jiang zai leyuan li huxiang chuandi jiubei [jingjiu],[tamen] bu hui yinci [yinjiu] kou chu hui yan, ye bu hui yinci [yinjiu] er fanzui [zai leyuan li yinjiu shi hefa de].
Tamen de [nan] tongpu zai pangbian fushi tamen, naxie tongpu youru bang ke li de zhenzhu.
Tamen bici zou lai, huxiang xunwen.
Tamen shuo:“Yiqian, women dique wei women de jiaren weiju [an la de xingfa],
dan [xianzai] an la yi shi en gei women, bing zhengjiu women tuolile huo yu de xingfa.
Yiqian, women dique chang qiqiu ta. Ta que shi ren'ai de, te ci de.”
Ni [mu sheng] dang [yi yisilan jiao] jiaohui [renlei]. Ping ni de zhu de enhui, ni ji bushi zhanbu zhe, ye bushi fengzi.
Huoxu tamen yao shuo:“[Ta] shige shiren, women dengdai ta [mu sheng] zao buxing.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dengdai ba! Wo dique ye tong nimen yiqi dengdai.”
Shi tamen de lizhi jiao tamen ruci wangyan ne? Haishi tamen shi panni de minzhong?
Nandao tamen yao shuo:“Ta [mu sheng] weizao ta [“gulanjing”]?” Bu, shi tamen bu xinyang.
Jiaru tamen shi chengshi zhe, jiao tamen zuochu [yu “gulanjing”] tongyang de jing wen lai!
Shi tamen cong wu dao you bei chuangzao ne? Haishi tamen jiushi chuangzao zhe?
Nandao tamen chuangzaole tiandi ma? Bu, shi tamen bu duxin [an la].
Shi tamen yongyou ni de zhu de baozang ne? Haishi tamen you quan weisuoyuwei?
Nandao tamen youyi ba ti zi neng [deng tian] qieting [tianshimen de tanhua] ma?[Yaoshi zheyang], rang tamen de qieting zhe na chu mingzheng lai ba!
Nandao nuhai gui ta [an la] er nanhai gui nimen ma?
Nandao ni [mu sheng] xiang tamen suoquguo [chuanjiao de] baochou, yin'er tamen wei nashui fudan tai zhong ma?
Nandao tamen zhidao wei jian zhi wu, yin'er tamen neng ba ta jilu xialai ma?
Nandao tamen xiang yinmou pohai [ni] ma? Bu xinyang zhe bi zi zhong qi ji.
Chu an la wai, nandao tamen hai you ying shou chongbai de zhu ma? Zanmei an la chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de [ouxiang].
Jiaru tamen neng kanjian yikuai tian diao xialai, tamen bi shuo:“[Zhe zhishi] yipian nong yun.”
Ni bie li tamen! Zhidao tamen zaoyu tamen bei zhen yun de rizi.
Zai na ri, tamen de jimou dui tamen jiang hao wu yichu, tamen ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu.
Ciqian, bu yi zhe hai yao shou ling yi zhong xingfa [zhu][zai chenshi suo zaoshou de zainan he fenmu zhong shenwen shi de xingfa], dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang naixin dengdai ni de zhu de panjue, yinwei ni que shi zai wo de juangu zhi xia de. Ni qichuang shi ying zanmei songyang ni de zhu;
zai yejian he xingchen moluo shi, ni ye ying zansong ta.
Yi moluo shi de xingchen fashi!
Nimen de tongban [mu sheng] ji meiyou mi wu, ye meiyou fancuo.
Ta wei ping siyu er yan.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi tasuo feng dao de qishi.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi [an la tongguo] qiang youli zhe [ji bu li lei tianshi] jiaoshou ta de.
[Ji bu li lei tianshi] shi chunjie de, da dao liao jinhu wanmei.
Ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] zai dipingxian de zuigao chu,
ranhou, ta xiajiang bing zhujian jiejin.
Ta xiangju liang gong zhi chang, huo geng jin.
Ta [an la] ba ta yao qishi de [tongguo ji bu li lei tianshi] qishi ta de puren [mu sheng].
Ta [mu sheng] de xin meiyou fouren ziji suo jian de.
Nandao nimen yao tong ta [mu sheng] zhenglun ta [sheng xiao] suo jian de ma?
Ta [mu sheng] que yi kanjian ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] di er ci xiajiang [zhi ling yici, bingfei sheng xiao na yici],
zai wujin [wu ren neng tongguo] de suanzao shu pang,
suanzao shu pang you yong ju de leyuan.
Dang suanzao shu zhegaile ying zhegai zhi wu shi,
[na shi mu sheng] mu wei xie shi, ye wei guofen [kan bu gai kan de].
Ta [mu sheng] que yi kanjian ta de zhu [an la] de yixie zuida de jixiang.
Nimen xiangguo ma? La te he ou zai [zhu][a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de liang ge ouxiang],
yiji di san ge——ma na [a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de ling yige ouxiang].
Nandao nanxing gui nimen, er nuxing gui ta [an la] ma?
Ruguo zheyang, zhe que shi zui bu gongping de fenpei.

Zhexie ouxiang zhishi nimen he nimen de zuxian suo qu de mingcheng eryi, an la bing wei dui ci jiang shi renhe zhengju. Tamen zhi shuncong caixiang he siyu, jinguan zhengdao que yi cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen.
Nandao ren xiang yao shenme jiu you she me ma?
Houshi he jinshi dou shi an la de.
Tianshang you xuduo tianshi, tamen de qiuqing hao wu yichu, chufei an la yunxu tamen wei tasuo yiyu zhe he xiyue zhe qiuqing zhihou.
Bu xinyang houshi zhe, tamen dique yi nuxing de mingzichenghu tianshimen.
Tamen dui ci hao wu zhishi, tamen zhi shuncong caixiang, er caixiang jue buneng tidai zhenli.
Fan beiqi wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”] er zhi zhuiqiu jinshi shenghuo zhe, ni dang bi kai tamen.
Zhe shi tamen zhishi de zuigao xiandu. Ni de zhu dique zui zhidao shei shi mishi zhengdao zhe, ye zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao zhe.

Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi an la de.[Fuhuo ri], ta jiang yi zuo'e zhe suo zuo de zui'e huan bao zuo'e zhe [ru zai huo yu li chengfa tamen], jiang yi xingshan zhe suo zuo de zui hao shangong baochou xingshan zhe [ru rang tamen zai leyuan li xiangle].

Fan yuan bi dazui [jian 6:152-153] He jianyin [zhu], zhi fan xiao zui zhe, ni de zhu que shi zui kuanrong de. Dang ta cong dadi chuangzao nimen [ru a dan shengren] shi, dang nimen haishi tai'er zai nimen de mu fu zhong shi, ta shi zui zhidao nimen de. Suoyi, nimen buyao zi cheng chunjie, ta zui zhidao shei shi jingwei zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] zhuyi dao nage beili [yisilan jiao] de ren ma?
Ta shaowei shishe jiu linse [zhu].
Nandao ta zhidao wei jian zhi wu, yin'er ta neng kanjian [zhenli he jieju] ma?
Nandao mei ren gaosuguo ta mu sa de jingdian zhong suo jizai de ma?
Yiji zunxing suoyou zhuming de yi bu la xin de jingdian zhong suo jizai de ma?
Yige fu zui zhe bu fudan bieren de zui'e.
Mei ren dou jiang huode ziji suo fendou de baochou [zhong gua de gua, zhong dou de dou].
[Fuhuo ri] ta fendou de jieguo jiang bei kanjian,
ranhou, ta jiang huode zui wanquan de baochou.
Ni de zhu [an la] que shi [wanwu] zuizhong de guisu.
Ta [an la] dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren xiao, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren ku.
Ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren si, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] rensheng.
Ta dique yong shechu de yidi jingye chuangzaole pei'ou——nanxing he nuxing.
[Fuhuo ri] ta dique yi zaizao wei jiren.
Ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren fuyu, ta dique neng shi [tasuo yiyu de] ren manyi.
Ta dique shi tianlangxing [a wei bo ren ceng chongbaiguo de xing] de zhu.
Ta [an la] dique huimiele yiqian de a de ren,
yiji sa mu de ren, yige ye meiyou liu xia.
Yiqian,[ta ceng huimiele] nu ha de zuren. Tamen que shi zui bu yi de, que shi zui panni de [tamen bu fucong an la ji qi shizhe nu ha].
Ta ceng huimiele bei dianfu de chengshi [ru lu te shengren fengming shenghuoguo de balesitan suo duo ma cheng].
Na fugai zhi wu [ru shi yu de xingfa] fugaile bei dianfu de chengshi.
[Ren a!] Ni yao huaiyi ni de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Zhe [mu sheng] shi yiqian naxie jinggao zhe zhong de yi wei jinggao zhe.
Fuhuo ri linjinle.
Chu an la wai, jue meiyou ren neng jiechu ta.
Nandao nimen dui zhe xun ci [“gulanjing”] gandao jingqi ma?
Nimen zenme wei ci xiao er bu wei ci ku ne?
Nimen [zhengzai langfei baogui de shijian] xiaoqian he yule [ru changge tiaowu].
Nimen dang xiang an la koutou, dang chongbai ta. Koutou chu
fuhuo de shijian linjinle, yueliang poliele [zhu].
Jiaru tamen kanjian yi zhong jixiang, tamen jiu bi kai, bingqie shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhong chang biaoyan de moshu.”
Tamen fouren [“gulanjing”], shuncong ziji de siyu. Mei jian shi duhui you ge dinglun [xingshan zhe ru leyuan, zuo'e zhe ru huo yu].
[“Gulanjing” zhong] xuduo baohan jingjie de xiaoxi que yi jianglin tamen,
na shi wanmei de zhihui [“gulanjing”], dan [jin ping] jinggao zhe [dui tamen de xuanjiao] shi wuyi [bugou] de.
Suoyi, ni [mu sheng] dang bi kai tamen. Dang zhaohuan zhe zhaohuan [tamen] zhi kepa zhi shi di na ri [fuhuo ri],
tamen jiang muguang beijian de cong fenmu zhong chulai, haoxiang sisan de huangchong,
jimang ben xiang zhaohuan zhe. Bu xinyang zhe jiang shuo:“Zhe shi yige kunan de rizi.”
Zai tamen zhiqian, nu ha de zuren ceng fouren [guo tamen de shizhe]. Tamen fouren wo de puren shuo:“Ta shige fengzi.” Ta ceng shou feinan [he weixie].
Suoyi ta qiqiu ta de zhu [shuo]:“Wo shibaile, qiu ni xiangzhu wo ba!”
Yinci, wo dakaile tianmen, jiangxia qingpen dayu,
bing shi dadi yong chu quanshui.[Yu] shui [he quanshui] feng jiding de mingling huihe.
Wo shi ta [nu ha] chengzuo zai yi zhi yong muban he dingzi zhizao de chuanshang,
na sou chuan zai wo de juangu zhi xia hangxing [piaoyou], yi baochou bei ren fouren zhe.
Wo que yi ba ci shi [nu ha shengren de chuan he hongshui] liu zuo yi zhong jixiang, dan you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Wo de xingfa he jinggao duo kepa!
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” rongyi jisong [zhu], dan you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
A de ren ceng fouren [guo tamen de shizhe hu de]. Wo de xingfa he jinggao duo kepa!
Wo que yi paiqian ci'er de kuangfeng zai yige kunan buxing zhi ri chengfa tamen.
Na kuangfeng jiang renmen ba [chui] qi, tamen haoxiang bei liangenba qi de ye zao shugan yiyang.
Wo de xingfa he jinggao duo kepa!
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” rongyi jisong, dan you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Sa mu de ren ceng fouren jinggao.
Tamen shuo:“[Ta zhishi] women tongzu de yige fanren, nandao women neng zhuisui ta [sa li ha shengren] ma? Ruguo zheyang, women bi xianyu mi wu he fengkuang zhong.
Zai women zhexie ren zhong, nandao qishi zhi jiang gei ta [sa li ha shengren] yiren ma? Bu, ta shi shuohuang zhe, shi aoman zhe.”
Tamen mingtian jiang zhidao shei shi shuohuang zhe, shei shi aoman zhe.
Wo bi jiang pai yitou mu tuo [zhu] kaoyan tamen, suoyi ni [sa li ha shengren] dang jianshi tamen, dang rennai.
Ni dang gaosu tamen,[jing] shui shi tamen [ren yu mu tuo] suo gongxiang de, mei ge dou you quan lunliu yinshui.
Dan tamen jiao laile tamen de tongban, ta [tamen de tongban] na qi jian ba mu tuo shale.
Wo de xingfa he jinggao duo kepa!
Wo que yi paiqian kongbu sheng [zhu] chengfa tamen, tamen bian chengle haoxiang jian yang juan zhe yong sheng de can geng yiyang.
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” rongyi jisong, dan you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Lu te de zuren ceng fouren jinggao.
Wo que yi paiqian fei shazou shi de baofeng chengfa tamen, wei lu te de jiaren liwai, wo zai tianliang qian zhengjiule tamen.
Na shi cong wo jiang shi de enhui, wo ruci baochou gan'en zhe.
Ta [lu te] que yi ba wo de xingfa jinggao tamen, dan tamen huaiyi jinggao.

Tamen que yi qitu rang ta zai ta de keren mianqian diulian [ru yaoqing ta de keren yu tamen yiqi gao tongxinglian], suoyi wo shi tamen de yankan bujian.[Wo shuo]:“Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba!”
Yi zhong yongjiu de xingfa que yi zai qingchen xiji tamen.
[Wo shuo]:“Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba!”
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” rongyi jisong, dan you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Jinggao [tongguo mu sa he ha lun] que yi jianglin falao de renmin,
dan tamen fouren wo de suoyou jixiang, yin'er wo yi quanneng de, wanneng de zhu de xingfa chengzhile tamen.

[Gu lai shen ren a!] Nimen zhong de bu xinyang zhe bi zhexie ren [ru nu ha de zuren, lu te de zuren, sa li ha de zuren he falao de renmin deng] geng hao ne? Haishi tian jing zhong you dui nimen de shemian?
Nandao tamen yao shuo “tamen shi yige chang sheng de tuanti” ma?
Nage tuanti jiang bei jikui, tamen jiang baibei er tao.
Bu, fuhuo de shijian shi tamen de yue qi, fuhuo de shijian shi zui jiannan de, shi zui tongku de.
Fanzui zhe [jinshi] dique zai mi wu zhong,[houshi] dique zai [huo yu de] shaozhuo zhong.
Tamen pazhe bei tuo ru huo yu di na ri,[you hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen changshi huo yu de shaozhuo ba!”
Wo dique yi qian ding [huo dingliang] chuangzao wanwu.
Wo de mingling zhiyou yige, youru zhuanyan zhi jian.
Wo que yi huimiele nimen de zongpai, dan you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Fanshi tamen suo zuo de, dou yi jilu zai gongguo bu zhong.
Wulun xiaoshi dashi, dou yi bei jilu [zhu].
Jingwei zhe bi zai leyuan he you heliu di difang.
Zai wanneng de zhu nali, bi you yige ruyi de xiwei [yong ju leyuan].
Pu ci zhi zhu [an la],
ta ceng jiaoshou [renlei]“gulanjing”.
Ta chuangzaole ren,
bing jiaoshou ta [ren] xiuci.
Ri yue yi guiding de chengxu yunxing,
xingchen he caomu ye chongbai ta [an la].
Ta sheng qile tian, zhidingle [gongping de] cheng,
yimian nimen yong cheng bugong.
Nimen dang gongping zunshou liangdu, buyao shi cheng liang buzu [zhu].
Ta wei wanwu shezhile dadi.
Da dishang you shuiguo, you dai qiao [bao zhu zaozi] de ye zao shu,
yiji ye jing ke zuo siliao de guwu he xiangcao.
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Ta ceng yong taoqi ban de niantu chuangzao ren [a dan],
ta ceng yong huoyan chuangzao jingling.
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
[Ta shi] liang ge dongfang de zhu, yeshi liang ge xifang de zhu [ji ta shi dongnan xibei de zhu].
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Ta shi [xianglian de] liang hai ziyou liudong er huihe,
bing zai liang hai zhi jian shezhi yige [yinxing] pingzhang, hu bu qinfan.
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Liang hai du chuchan zhenzhu he shanhu.
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Haishang shan yiban laiwang de chuanbo gui ta [an la] zhangguan.
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Da dishang de yiqie dou jiang xiaowang,
wei ni weida er zungui de zhu de benti jiang yongcun.
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou xiang ta qiqiu suo xu, ta meitian du zai chuli shiwu [ru yi fangmian shi yixie ren chusheng, ling yi fangmian you shi yixie ren siwang deng].
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
Jingling he renlei [zhu] a! Wo jiang zhuanmen chuli nimen de shiwu.
Nimen [renlei he jingling] yao fouren nimen de zhu de na xiang enhui ne?
